text:
I'm running a fairly simple setup,
and just noticed apache was 140M.
I restarted it (2.7M), and see the
process grows by 4k every request.

I have the following modules loaded:

auth
log_config
proxy (proxypass via rewriteaction [P])
proxy_http
rewrite
worker

kernel 2.4.18, gcc 3.0.4, glibc 2.2.4
creator: belg4mit@pthbb.org

text:
I haven't seen any other reports of this, so it appears likely it is something
specific to your setup.  Could you try with the newest version (2.0.40)
to see if it still happens.  Feel free to reopen the report if the problem
persists.
creator: slive@apache.org
